g.title: title
g.text: Phase Space: T vs V Regimes

g.title: examples
g.text: Q1: Well-run agile team, CI/CD, clean architecture
Q2: Startup racing competitor, cutting corners
Q3: Mature open-source library, stable API

g.title: measurements
g.text: → Compute from git churn + field changes
Plot (T, V) point each time step
